# .huge[**Environment, Health, and Education <br> GLOA 610-001**]



```{r include=F, cache=T}

library(WDI)

var = c('CO2' = 'NY.ADJ.DCO2.GN.ZS',
        'air' = 'EN.ATM.PM25.MC.M3',
        'GDPpc' = 'NY.GDP.PCAP.KD',
        'school' = 'SE.PRM.NENR',
        'life' = 'SP.DYN.LE00.IN')

wdi <- WDI(indicator=var,
           start=1970,
           country = 'all',
           end=2020,
           extra=TRUE)   %>%
  filter(region !="Aggregates") %>%
  drop_na(GDPpc) %>%
  mutate(developed = 
           case_when(
             GDPpc > 10000 ~ "Developed",
             GDPpc < 10000 ~ "Under-developed"
           )) 
```

<div class="full-width-tinted"><br>
  <h1> $$ CO_2 \text{ } \text{Damage, % of GNI} $$  </h1> 
</div><br><br>

```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=7, cache=T}

wdi %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,
             y=CO2,
             group=developed)) +
  geom_point(aes(color=developed),
             alpha=0.25, size=2) +
  geom_smooth(aes(color=developed), 
              alpha=0.5) +
  labs(x = "YEAR",
       y = "Economic Cost of CO2 (% GNI)") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.title=element_text(size=25),
        legend.text=element_text(size=25),
        axis.text=element_text(size=20),
        axis.title=element_text(size=20)) +
  ylim(0, 20)
```
